sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Battery, Zap, Shield, Truck, Search, Filter, Star, MapPin, Clock, TrendingUp, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, Users, Award } from 'lucide-react'; import './App.css'; const BatteryMarketplace = () => { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('intro'); const [selectedBattery, setSelectedBattery] = useState(null); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [filterType, setFilterType] = useState('all'); const batteries = [ { id: 1, type: 'Tesla Model S', capacity: '85kWh', testedCapacity: '78kWh', price: 8500, location: 'San Francisco, CA', seller: 'EV Solutions Inc.', rating: 4.8, condition: 'Excellent', cycles: 1200, voltage: '350V', chemistry: 'NCA', useCases: ['Home Energy Storage', 'Grid Backup', 'Solar Integration', 'Off-grid Cabin'], description: 'High-capacity battery pack from a 2018 Tesla Model S. Carefully removed and tested. Perfect for residential energy storage applications.' }, { id: 2, type: 'Nissan Leaf', capacity: '40kWh', testedCapacity: '35kWh', price: 3200, location: 'Austin, TX', seller: 'Green Battery Co.', rating: 4.6, condition: 'Good', cycles: 2100, voltage: '350V', chemistry: 'LiMn2O4', useCases: ['Small Home Backup', 'Workshop Power', 'RV/Boat Power', 'Emergency Power'], description: 'Reliable battery pack from 2020 Nissan Leaf. Shows good performance for secondary applications.' }, { id: 3, type: 'BMW i3', capacity: '33kWh', testedCapacity: '29kWh', price: 2800, location: 'Portland, OR', seller: 'Pacific Battery', rating: 4.9, condition: 'Very Good', cycles: 1800, voltage: '353V', chemistry: 'LiFePO4', useCases: ['Tiny Home Power', 'Backup Power', 'Mobile Workshop', 'Camping Setup'], description: 'Compact yet powerful battery from BMW i3. Excellent for smaller scale energy storage projects.' }, { id: 4, type: 'Chevy Bolt', capacity: '60kWh', testedCapacity: '55kWh', price: 5200, location: 'Denver, CO', seller: 'Mountain Energy', rating: 4.7, condition: 'Excellent', cycles: 950, voltage: '350V', chemistry: 'NMC', useCases: ['Home Energy Storage', 'Small Business Backup', 'Solar Battery Bank', 'Off-grid System'], description: 'Low-cycle battery pack from 2019 Chevy Bolt. Ideal capacity for residential applications.' } ]; const filteredBatteries = batteries.filter(battery => { const matchesSearch = battery.type.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || battery.seller.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesFilter = filterType === 'all' || (filterType === 'high-capacity' && parseInt(battery.capacity) >= 50) || (filterType === 'budget' && battery.price < 4000) || (filterType === 'premium' && battery.condition === 'Excellent'); return matchesSearch && matchesFilter; }); const IntroPage = () => (
{/* Navigation */}
ReVolt
How it Works Safety Sellers
{/* Hero Section */}
Trusted by 10,000+ energy professionals

The Future of Battery Reuse

Connect with certified sellers of premium used lithium-ion batteries. Power your next project sustainably with thoroughly tested, high-performance battery packs.

{/* Stats */}
2,500+
Batteries Sold
98%
Customer Satisfaction
500+
Verified Sellers
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose ReVolt?

We make buying used batteries safe, transparent, and reliable

Certified Testing

Every battery undergoes comprehensive testing including capacity verification, cycle count analysis, and safety inspections by certified technicians.

Detailed Analytics

Access complete performance data, degradation curves, and capacity retention metrics to make informed purchasing decisions.

Quality Guarantee

30-day money-back guarantee and comprehensive warranty coverage on all battery purchases through our platform.

{/* How It Works */}

How It Works

Simple, transparent, secure

1

Browse Batteries

Search through our curated selection of tested batteries with detailed specifications.

2

Review Details

Examine capacity tests, cycle counts, and recommended use cases for each battery.

3

Contact Seller

Connect directly with verified sellers and request additional inspections if needed.

4

Secure Delivery

Professional handling and insured shipping directly to your location.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Power Your Project?

Join thousands of professionals who trust ReVolt for their battery needs

{/* Footer */}
ReVolt

The trusted marketplace for premium used lithium-ion batteries.

Marketplace

  • Browse Batteries
  • Sell Batteries
  • Pricing

Support

  • Help Center
  • Safety Guide
  • Contact Us

Company

  • About
  • Careers
  • Press

© 2025 ReVolt. All rights reserved.

); const MarketplacePage = () => (
{/* Header */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="search-input" />
{/* Battery Grid */}

Available Batteries

Browse our selection of certified pre-owned lithium-ion batteries

{filteredBatteries.map(battery => (
setSelectedBattery(battery)} className="battery-card" >
{battery.condition}

{battery.type}

Tested Capacity: {battery.testedCapacity}
Cycles: {battery.cycles.toLocaleString()}
{battery.location.split(',')[0]}
{battery.rating}
${battery.price.toLocaleString()} by {battery.seller}
))}
); const BatteryDetail = ({ battery }) => (
{/* Header */}
{/* Left Column */}

{battery.type} Battery Pack

{battery.description}

{battery.rating} rating
{battery.location}
{/* Specifications */}

Technical Specifications

Original Capacity
{battery.capacity}
Tested Capacity
{battery.testedCapacity}
Voltage
{battery.voltage}
Chemistry
{battery.chemistry}
Cycle Count
{battery.cycles.toLocaleString()}
Condition
{battery.condition}
{/* Right Column */}
${battery.price.toLocaleString()}
Sold by {battery.seller}

Recommended Use Cases

{battery.useCases.map((useCase, index) => (
{useCase}
))}

Performance Analysis

This battery retains {Math.round((parseInt(battery.testedCapacity) / parseInt(battery.capacity)) * 100)}% of its original capacity after {battery.cycles.toLocaleString()} cycles. Suitable for applications requiring {parseInt(battery.testedCapacity) * 0.8}-{battery.testedCapacity} of reliable energy storage.

); if (selectedBattery) { return ; } return currentPage === 'intro' ? : ; }; export default BatteryMarketplace;
